product_name: Dale of Norway Snowflake Hat - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Dale of Norway Snowflake hat features moisture-wicking, medium weight Norwegian wool to keep your head warm and comfortable during cold-weather outings. Fully lined for comfort; earflaps with tassles keep your ears warm. Hand wash. Closeout.
short_description: The Dale of Norway Snowflake hat features moisture-wicking, medium weight Norwegian wool to keep your head warm and comfortable during cold-weather outings.
